ccu-value.tip1: Omit Interface, Channel and/or Datapoint if you want to supply them via
ccu-value.tip3: Alternatively you can supply all 3 via
ccu-value.tip5: Mind that this node only emits messages if Interface, Channel und Datapoint are set. To receive events from multiple actuators please use the "rpc event" node.
ccu-value.working: Don't emit values while actuator is in WORKING state
